name: email-gmail
description: Gmail integration for reading, sending, and managing emails via Gmail API
author: Zaakify
capabilities: List emails from inbox and labels
Read full email messages with attachment metadata
Search emails with Gmail query syntax
Mark emails as read/unread or starred
configurationGuide: Two-step OAuth setup: (1) Call gmail-setup-start with Google Cloud credentials, (2) User authorizes in browser, (3) Call gmail-setup-check to complete setup. Both tools must be called!
